title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART ME
description: "You seem to know thing about me... Can I ask you about something?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, let us dispatch with th..."
dialogueTree.text: "Of course, let us dispatch with the formalities. You call me Evrart, I call you Harry!"

links.title: Inland Empire: "That's what the hanged corpse calle..."
links.text: That's what the hanged corpse called you -- Harry.

links.title: You: ""Is that my name?""
links.text: "Is that my name?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""My god so it's true! I didn't want..."
links.text: "My god so it's true! I didn't want to believe it, but you *are* a fantastic science-fiction amnesiac cop, aren't you?" He shrugs with an amazed expression. "What are the odds of that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think the odds of that..." He lo..."
links.text: "I think the odds of that..." He looks at you. "Are very low."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It might be a good idea to hide you..."
links.text: It might be a good idea to hide your *confusion*... I mean, see what his game is first.

links.title: You: ""It's true. My memory is a bit hazy.""
links.text: "It's true. My memory is a bit hazy."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I assure you, there's nothing to b..."
links.text: "I assure you, there's nothing to be ashamed of, Harry. You're among friends and the good news is..." He taps on the folder in front of him.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I have a big fat folder on you, Ha..."
links.text: "I have a big fat folder on you, Harry. I'm sure you have a lot of questions to ask -- maybe I can help you out?"

links.title: Half Light: "Don't trust him. For all you know *..."
links.text: Don't trust him. For all you know *Du Bois* might be his name. You need to confirm this.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm sure you had some concerns you..."
links.text: "I'm sure you had some concerns you thought I might be able to address," he pauses to look down on a brown folder on his desk. "And you were probably right -- I can."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "It's just a brown folder. You can't..."
links.text: It's just a brown folder. You can't make out what's written on it.

links.title: You: ""My memory is fine -- I'm just test..."
links.text: "My memory is fine -- I'm just testing you."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""So good to hear that, Harry. Appar..."
links.text: "So good to hear that, Harry. Apparently my sources were wrong." He pats the brown folder in front of him. "However if you *did* have a spot of memory trouble I could help you out -- with my big fat folder."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Words flow like a river of honey fr..."
links.text: Words flow like a river of honey from his lips.

links.title: Rhetoric: "I guess word has already reached hi..."
links.text: I guess word has already reached him. No matter, no harm done.

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, I know everything about you, H..."
dialogueTree.text: "Oh, I know everything about you, Harry." He taps on the folder in front of him. "I have a big fat folder on you. Very juicy stuff."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""And the word on the street is your..."
links.text: "And the word on the street is your memory is a bit... hazy." He looks at you questioningly. "If that's true, maybe I can help you out? Do you a little favour so to speak."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It might be a good idea to hide you..."
links.text: It might be a good idea to hide your *confusion*... I mean, see what his game is first.

links.title: You: ""It's true. My memory *is* a bit ha..."
links.text: "It's true. My memory *is* a bit hazy."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I assure you, there's nothing to b..."
links.text: "I assure you, there's nothing to be ashamed of, Harry. You're among friends and the good news is..." He taps on the folder again.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""My big fat folder is ready to serv..."
links.text: "My big fat folder is ready to serve. I'm sure you have a lot of questions -- maybe my fat folder and I can help you out? Do you a little favour of sorts?"

links.title: Perception (Sight): "It's just a brown folder. You can't..."
links.text: It's just a brown folder. You can't make out what's written on it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you trying to tell me you've g..."
links.text: "Are you trying to tell me you've gotten hold of some of our documents?" The lieutenant inspects Evrart over his spectacles.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Kitsuragi, would you mind?" Hi..."
links.text: "Mr. Kitsuragi, would you mind?" His eyes never leave yours. "Harry has some questions he needs answers to."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Kitsuragi, would you mind?" Hi..."
links.text: "Mr. Kitsuragi, would you mind?" His eyes never leave yours. "Me and Harry are talking about his lost identity right now."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You *must* have questions, Harry...."
links.text: "You *must* have questions, Harry. C'mon on now..." He makes a come-hither motion. "Don't be shy. Let's hear them."

links.title: Volition: "Asking too many questions will make..."
links.text: Asking too many questions will make you look weak. You should maybe focus on the folder.

links.title: Drama: "Don't just jump to the folder. That..."
links.text: Don't just jump to the folder. That's not smart, shows you're on the edge. Do some probing first.

links.title: You: ""Let's get this straight... what is..."
links.text: "Let's get this straight... what is my full name?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It's Harry..." He glances at the f..."
links.text: "It's Harry..." He glances at the folder. "Harry Du Bois."

links.title: Inland Empire: "You feel like a *Du Bois*, but you..."
links.text: You feel like a *Du Bois*, but you don't feel like a *Harry*. Strange.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You don't feel like any of these th..."
links.text: You don't feel like any of these things -- you know what your name is. You have a sophisticated name. Like that of a count. Or a beautiful man.

links.title: You: ""Wait, I thought *you* are Harry Du..."
links.text: "Wait, I thought *you* are Harry Du Bois."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No. I'm really, really not. *You*..."
links.text: "No. I'm really, really not. *You* are, Harry."

links.title: You: ""I am Tequila Sunset.""
links.text: "I am Tequila Sunset."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Excellent! I know you RCM people l..."
links.text: "Excellent! I know you RCM people like your call signs. Harry 'Tequila Sunset' Du Bois -- I can see that. But to me -- and the census bureau -- you will always be little Harry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant covers his face and..."
links.text: The lieutenant covers his face and sighs audibly.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Kitsuragi doesn't seem even sl..."
links.text: "Mr. Kitsuragi doesn't seem even slightly empathetic to your memory loss, Harry." He frowns at the lieutenant. "I, however, wish to help you any way I can."

links.title: You: ""I feel like a Du Bois, but not qui..."
links.text: "I feel like a Du Bois, but not quite like a Harry. Something longer."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Sure, okay. You're Harold. Harman...."
links.text: "Sure, okay. You're Harold. Harman. Haroldemus. But that's not what the record says. The record says 'Harry Du Bois'." He taps on the folder. "A real *man's* name. "

links.title: You: ""That's not my name, my name is Rap..."
links.text: "That's not my name, my name is Raphael Costeau."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Fine, Harry." He waves you off. "Y..."
links.text: "Fine, Harry." He waves you off. "You can even be Harry Raphael Du Bois De Costeau -- or whatever you *choose* to be."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I like it. I can work with t..."
links.text: "Okay, I like it. I can work with that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""And *I* can work with you, Harry!"..."
links.text: "And *I* can work with you, Harry!" He raises his index finger. "Now, what else can I do for you?"

links.title: You: ""I don't really like it.""
links.text: "I don't really like it."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Don't be silly, Harry." He smiles..."
links.text: "Don't be silly, Harry." He smiles broadly. "Harry Du Bois -- That's a real man's name. A Union man's."

links.title: Conceptualization: "You don't feel like either one of t..."
links.text: You don't feel like either one of these things -- you know what your name is. You have a sophisticated name. Like that of a count. Or a beautiful man.

links.title: You: ""Do you know where I live?""
links.text: "Do you know where I live?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But of course, Harry." He nods. "Y..."
links.text: "But of course, Harry." He nods. "Your precinct is the 41st and you live in Jamrock. You're a Jamrock boy. A long way from home, but that's okay."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He doesn't really seem to know any..."
links.text: He doesn't really seem to know any more about it.

links.title: You: ""Do you know anything about my fami..."
links.text: "Do you know anything about my family? Do I have a wife or kids or...?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Family? Harry, you're *not* a fami..."
links.text: "Family? Harry, you're *not* a family man. There's not one peep of family in here. Unless you *think* you're a family man? Do you strike yourself as a family man, Harry?"

links.title: You: ""You're right, I don't.""
links.text: "You're right, I don't."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""That's why I like you, Harry!" His..."
links.text: "That's why I like you, Harry!" His fat finger is pointing at you. "A good man knows both his strengths and his weaknesses and you my friend... you are one of the *all time greats*."

links.title: You: ""I think I do. I'd be a wonderful f..."
links.text: "I think I do. I'd be a wonderful father."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Well... yes." He looks around, uni..."
links.text: "Well... yes." He looks around, uninterested. "I'm sure you're gonna make one little boy or a girl very happy and proud one day, Harry."

links.title: You: ""Never mind the family.""
links.text: "Never mind the family."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Family, Harry..." He glances lovin..."
links.text: "Family, Harry..." He glances lovingly at the framed photo in front of him. "... is the most important thing in the world."

links.title: You: ""What kind of a cop does it say I a..."
links.text: "What kind of a cop does it say I am ?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It says..." He looks in the folder..."
links.text: "It says..." He looks in the folder. "Oh yes... very interesting. It says you're more like a mad prophet than a cop. Always rambling about the end of the world... I'm sure these stories are exaggerated."

links.title: You: ""Exaggerated?! Evrart, the time is..."
links.text: "Exaggerated?! Evrart, the time is now! We are looking at a *catastrophic global* loss of life."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, Harry." He nods along...."
links.text: "Of course, Harry." He nods along. "Sin, blood, death, catastrophic loss of life... all those things. And that's why you and I must be prepared, so let's talk about how we can help each other."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He's probably just making a guess b..."
links.text: He's probably just making a guess based on your recent activity in Martinaise.

links.title: You: ""Very much exaggerated. I'm not a m..."
links.text: "Very much exaggerated. I'm not a mad prophet. I'm just a cop."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I know that, Harry." He smiles bro..."
links.text: "I know that, Harry." He smiles broadly. "I *know* you. And rest assured, your secret is safe with me."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Well, Harry..."  He turns a couple..."
links.text: "Well, Harry..."  He turns a couple of pages in the folder. "If I were to sum you up in one word, it would be *apologetic*."

links.title: You: ""I'm... sorry?""
links.text: "I'm... sorry?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes." He inspects you over his gia..."
links.text: "Yes." He inspects you over his giant bug-eyed glasses. "You seem to be. A lot of the time. But right now there's no reason to be. Let loose a little. Be *you*."

links.title: You: ""What? I'm not apologetic. I'm conf..."
links.text: "What? I'm not apologetic. I'm confident."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Well you sure come off as very con..."
links.text: "Well you sure come off as very confident in all our interactions, Harry." He chuckles. "You're a real man's man."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh Harry..." He opens the folder a..."
links.text: "Oh Harry..." He opens the folder and leafs through its contents. "You are the most regular, traditional, by-the-book law official imaginable."

links.title: You: ""I just want to do my job, that's a..."
links.text: "I just want to do my job, that's all."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""As do we all, Harry." He nods, a s..."
links.text: "As do we all, Harry." He nods, a sympathetic look in his eyes. "We're all just trying to do our best, aren't we? I'm gonna help you do yours."

links.title: You: ""Hey, I'm not *that* ordinary!""
links.text: "Hey, I'm not *that* ordinary!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course you're not, Harry," he e..."
links.text: "Of course you're not, Harry," he exclaims. "You're my special boy! Big friend of the Union. This is *very* non-ordinary."

links.title: You: ""Hey, I'm not that regular, check o..."
links.text: "Hey, I'm not that regular, check out my tie."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now that is *funky*, Harry." He ru..."
links.text: "Now that is *funky*, Harry." He rubs his big hands together. "You are a colourful fellow, not a boring stiff like this deceitful folder here implies."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "We are charming his pants off, *bra..."
links.text: We are charming his pants off, *bratan*! Great job!

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, you're not simply a cop, yo..."
links.text: "Harry, you're not simply a cop, you're a star! A bright shining star in the drab law enforcement sky, outshining all other stars. You're a *super* star."

links.title: You: ""That's what I like about you, Evra..."
links.text: "That's what I like about you, Evrart. You get me."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course I do, Harry." He smiles..."
links.text: "Of course I do, Harry." He smiles a sly smile. "And I'm gonna help you shine. I'm gonna put you on all the big stages. Your name in giant neon letters: 'HARRY DU BOIS.'"

links.title: Inland Empire: "The giant neon sign reading "HARRY..."
links.text: The giant neon sign reading "HARRY DU BOIS" hanging from the Kvalsund crane can be seen all the way to Jamrock.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Somewhere in Mirova a beautiful wom..."
links.text: Somewhere in Mirova a beautiful woman sees the bright glow on the horizon and says to herself: "Oh my god, I shouldn't have left him..."

links.title: You: ""No-no-no-no... NO. I'm definitely..."
links.text: "No-no-no-no... NO. I'm definitely not a star."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Nonsense, Harry." He shakes his he..."
links.text: "Nonsense, Harry." He shakes his head. "You lit up this container, when you walked in here. You're my golden boy."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Well, Harry..." He opens the folde..."
links.text: "Well, Harry..." He opens the folder and leafs through its contents. "It looks like you like to party -- hard. And you like disco music. I guess you're a disco-cop."

links.title: You: ""I *do* like me some disco.""
links.text: "I *do* like me some disco."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, sometimes I think we're so..."
links.text: "Harry, sometimes I think we're so similar it frightens me!" He holds his giant head between his hands. "I too love... regular, normal music!"

links.title: You: ""I'm planning on changing a lot of..."
links.text: "I'm planning on changing a lot of things about myself."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm going to stand 100% behind you..."
links.text: "I'm going to stand 100% behind you through all these changes, Harry." He reaches his arms out. "You need to understand that all I want to do is to help you."

links.title: You: ""Where did you get that folder?""
links.text: "Where did you get that folder?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Ah, this?" He closes the folder. "..."
links.text: "Ah, this?" He closes the folder. "My friends in your organization gave it to me, Harry."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This translates into: "Ha-ha, you g..."
links.text: This translates into: "Ha-ha, you guys are so corrupt."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I find that very suspicious. May I..."
links.text: "I find that very suspicious. May I have a look?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm afraid this is meant for Union..."
links.text: "I'm afraid this is meant for Union eyes only, Mr. Kitsuragi. I'm sure you understand." He turns back to you. "Please continue, Harry."

links.title: You: "Have another look at that folder."
links.text: Have another look at that folder.

links.title: Drama: "As you look at the folder, Evrart c..."
links.text: As you look at the folder, Evrart covers it with his hand and pets it. Is he trying to hide that it's not a real RCM folder? It certainly doesn't have the RCM stamp on it.

links.title: You: ""That's not an RCM folder.""
links.text: "That's not an RCM folder."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Okay, Harry, you got me," he says,..."
links.text: "Okay, Harry, you got me," he says, grinning. "This is from the Census Bureau, not the RCM. Those Census Bureau people are absolutely *corrupt*. You should do something about them."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He got the name from the Census Bu..."
links.text: "He got the name from the Census Bureau and everything else from your actions here in Martinaise."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, yes, Mr. Kitsuragi, from the..."
links.text: "Yes, yes, Mr. Kitsuragi, from the Census Bureau, like I said." He looks annoyed. "Now I'm actually a very busy man, so is there anything else I can do for you, Harry?"

links.title: Logic: "That means he doesn't *really* know..."
links.text: That means he doesn't *really* know anything about you.

links.title: Inland Empire: "A pity. The mystery of *you* will h..."
links.text: A pity. The mystery of *you* will have to remain a mystery for the time being.

links.title: You: ""So the Census Bureau says my name..."
links.text: "So the Census Bureau says my name is Harry Du Bois?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, that's what I said. Try to ke..."
links.text: "Yes, that's what I said. Try to keep up, okay? Let's move on."

links.title: Drama: "He got the name from the Census Bur..."
links.text: He got the name from the Census Bureau and everything else from your behaviour here in Martinaise.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But I really got you good there fo..."
links.text: "But I really got you good there for a moment, didn't I, Harry?" He laughs like he just pulled off a successful prank. "Now what can I do for you?"

links.title: Drama: "Evrart's large hands are covering t..."
links.text: Evrart's large hands are covering the folder, but the look on his face says *I know everything about you, Harry*.

links.title: You: ""He knows everything about me.""
links.text: "He knows everything about me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure it's not that bad," the l..."
links.text: "I'm sure it's not that bad," the lieutenant whispers. "At worst he has an old RCM folder, and I very much doubt even that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry..." he says gently. "I just..."
links.text: "Harry..." he says gently. "I just know the things that matter to our friendship. And I want you to feel free to ask me about those things."

links.title: You: ""I've got nothing to hide.""
links.text: "I've got nothing to hide."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh Harry..." He peeks into the fol..."
links.text: "Oh Harry..." He peeks into the folder -- as if it's hard to turn away from the mysteries inside. "Oh wow... this is really something."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure it's not that bad," the l..."
links.text: "I'm sure it's not that bad," the lieutenant whispers. "At worst he has an old RCM folder, and I very much doubt even that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""So how about it, Harry?" He leans..."
links.text: "So how about it, Harry?" He leans back in the chair. "You need assistance, I presume."

links.title: You: ""Let's talk of other matters for a..."
links.text: "Let's talk of other matters for a moment."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, Harry, of course! Let's..."
links.text: "Of course, Harry, of course! Let's not linger on personal details and amnesia. You wanted something from me?"

links.title: You: ""My memory is fine. Don't worry abo..."
links.text: "My memory is fine. Don't worry about it."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""So good to hear that, Harry. Appar..."
links.text: "So good to hear that, Harry. Apparently my sources were wrong." He pats the brown folder again.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""However if you *would* have a spot..."
links.text: "However if you *would* have a spot of memory trouble -- well, let's just say a fat juicy folder could really fill in the blanks." He winks at you.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Words flow like a river of honey fr..."
links.text: Words flow like a river of honey from his lips.

links.title: Rhetoric: "I guess word has already reached hi..."
links.text: I guess word has already reached him. No matter, no harm done.
